criticalFailure.@en: Your mind is suddenly awash in confusion. How did you get here? You lose 6+[WB] days of memories permanently.

criticalSuccess.@en: They forget 6+[WB] days of memories permanently.

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and one foe cannot or fails to Resist using Scrutinize), they temporarily forget 6+[WB] days of memories, including the moment when you cast the Spell.

reagents.@en: A ring of obsidian, worn on the hand you place upon your victim
